evaluation.feedback: The test taker demonstrates a good command of English, with sentences well-structured and accurately pronounced. Fluency and grammar are both strengths, with continuous speech and correct usage of different tenses and structures. Vocabulary could be enhanced, with a stronger variety of words and phrases used to express ideas more precisely. The test taker understood and was able to discuss a complex subject, showing good conversational skills, however the structure and links between ideas could be improved for better coherence.
